V1¶

Shopcart¶

fastemplate.services.v1.shopcart.add_item(cart_id: str, item: fastemplate.objects.cart.CartItem)[source]¶

Removes an item from the cart.

If price is set to zero (0), item is removed from cart.

Parameters

  • id (str) – cart id

  • item (CartItem) – pair of name and price

Returns

dict

fastemplate.services.v1.shopcart.add_list(cart_id: str, items: fastemplate.objects.cart.CartItemsList)[source]¶

Endpoint. Add items list to cart.

Parameters

  • id (str) – cart id

  • items (CartItemsList) – items list

Return dict

dict

Endpoint. Return a summary and erases the cart.

id (str) – cart id

dict

Endpoint. Retrieves the cart’s items and prices.

fastemplate.services.v1.shopcart.list_some_items(cart_id: str, start: int, stop: int)[source]¶

Endpoint. List a items from the cart, based on a range.

Parameters

  • id (str) – cart id

  • start (int) – first index to iterate

  • stop (int) – last index to iterate

Returns

dict
